summary: Give Benor a more pleasant appearance.
descriptionHtml:
I always thought Benor was a nice character, but I thought he looked hideous. So I decided to change his appearance with Skyrim Npc Editor to make him look better and more like a nord.

I gave him longer hair and a beard as well as a cool scar under his eye.

Doesn't require any mods

This is my first mod

Suggested mods For my Look
Skyrim NPC Editor 0_75_1 by foretrenty http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4554/?
High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/?
Beards by Hvergelmir http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?
Brows by Hvergelmir http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?
Northborn Scars by Northborn http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?
High Quality Eyes by Xenius http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/498/?
author: Mikeydmc
